title: Low Staking Reward
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description I seem to be getting the same warrning and errors since upgrading to alpha 9 and a lowered staking reward from 10% to 5-7% A clear and concise description of the problem... ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes, the previous version in which this bug was not present was: .... This issue is new in alpah 9 ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction No flags for my beacon prysm.sh validator --enable-account-metrics --password=tom ## üî• Error
